Package food

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
food.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents a menu consisting of dishes, meals, and specials.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Constructs an empty menu.
